translation.en: [girl 1] This is my last chance to be normal.
translation.es: Esta es mi última oportunidad de ser normal.

translation.en: The world don't know that yet.
translation.es: El mundo aún no lo sabe.

translation.en: [girl 2] I don't want to share you with the world.
translation.es: No quiero compartirte con el mundo.

translation.en: Oh, y'all in here kissing again, huh?
[girl 1] I told you to stop climbing through my window,
'cause if Mommy catch you, I'mma get a beating.
translation.es: Si mami te atrapa, me dará una paliza.

translation.en: You're the only one she ain't gonna beat. Mommy slapped the shit out of me last week.
translation.es: - No te la dará solo a ti. - Me abofeteó la semana pasada.
Sí, claro. La mandaste a la mierda.

translation.en: It's 'cause you told her to go to hell. You deserved it.
translation.es: Sí, claro. La mandaste a la mierda. Te lo merecías.

translation.en: [girl 2] She tells your father to go to hell all the time.
translation.es: Siempre manda a tu padre a la mierda.

translation.en: She's grown. She can do that.
As long as we live in this house, we children.
translation.es: Mientras vivamos en esta casa, somos niños.

translation.en: And children must honor… [both] …thy mother and thy father.
translation.es: Y los niños deben honrar a su madre y a su padre.

translation.en: It's in the Bible. You gotta do it.
translation.es: Está en la Biblia. Debes hacerlo.

translation.en: If we did everything the Bible say, we'd live in a pretty messed-up world.
translation.es: Si hiciéramos todo según la Biblia, el mundo sería un desastre.

translation.en: Why you always want what I got? 'Cause my nerves are bad.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué siempre quieres lo mío? - Porque tengo nervios.

translation.en: [girl 2] I don't know why, you don't do shit.
translation.es: No sé por qué, no haces nada.

translation.en: She ain't never had a hard day's work in her life.
translation.es: Nunca ha trabajado duro en la vida.

translation.en: Mommy makes me practice for six hours a day,
translation.es: Mami me hace practicar seis horas al día

translation.en: and she yells at me the whole time.
translation.es: y me grita todo el tiempo.

translation.en: Both of y'all can shut the fuck up.
Get your asses down here right now! Your father's home!
-She ain't call my name. -[Abel] Don't worry. I'll protect you.
translation.es: - No me llamó. - No te preocupes. Te protegeré.

translation.en: and when she starts giving me the evil eye, you don't do shit.
translation.es: y, cuando me mira feo, no haces nada.

translation.en: Don't be messin' up my bag, boy.
What was y'all doing up there?
Go in there and say hello to your daddy.
translation.es: Vayan a saludar a su papá.

translation.en: Why you let him smoke that cigar in the house?
Look, I don't care if you do it. Just don't bring it around your sister.
translation.es: No me importa si lo haces, pero no lo hagas con tu hermana.

translation.en: [Father] You singing in church or something? Jesus all right with me.
translation.es: ¿Qué cantarán en la iglesia? ¿"Jesus Is Alright with Me"?

translation.en: I was just trying to help.
Look at that. Do you like it? -It's beautiful. -Mmm.
Take it out. Let me put it on you. You just pull that.
translation.es: Sácala y te la pondré. Toma eso.

translation.en: This you must always wear in honor of God's love for you.
translation.es: Siempre debes usar esto en honor al amor que te tiene Dios.

translation.en: Turn around. Let me put this on you.
This will affirm your faith, keep you safe,
translation.es: Esto afirmará tu fe y te mantendrá a salvo.

translation.en: [echoing] …that God loves you as His own.
translation.es: que Dios te ama como si fueras suya.

translation.en: Always wear this. It'll protect you, keep you safe.
translation.es: Úsala siempre. Te protegerá y te mantendrá a salvo.

translation.en: Always wear this. Always… It'll protect you. [echoes overlapping]
translation.es: Úsala siempre. Te protegerá. Te recordará… Te hará entender…

translation.en: How come you didn't bring me nothing?

translation.es: mamá hizo lo que te gusta.

translation.en: -[Beauty] I thought you liked-- -Get them bags upstairs, boy.
translation.es: - Creí que te… - Sube esas maletas.

translation.en: [Abel] You lucky Beauty was here. I was about to drop your ass.
translation.es: No te golpeo solo porque Beauty está aquí.

translation.en: Nigga, you wasn't about to do shit. Beauty just saved your life.
translation.es: Viejo, no ibas a hacer nada. Beauty te salvó la vida.

translation.en: I'm sick of his ass always trying to punk me. He just mad 'cause he ain't cute like y'all.
translation.es: - Siempre quiere golpearme. - Le molesta no ser lindo como ustedes.

translation.en: Ain't my fault he got a ugly daddy. [Mother] Do not say that about your brother.
translation.es: - No es mi culpa que su papá sea feo. - No digas eso de tu hermano.

translation.en: You're never going to convince me
that in order to live, I gotta eat something dead.
translation.es: de que, para vivir, debo conseguir algo de eso.

translation.en: You ain't gonna convince me. It's not gonna happen.
translation.es: No me vas a convencer. No sucederá.

translation.en: [inhales] I heard you shut the place down last night.
Wanted to see if you got what it takes.
translation.es: Quería ver si podías con eso.

translation.en: I guess I do. I could've told you that.
translation.es: - Supongo que sí. - Ya lo sabía.

translation.en: Still can't hold a candle to me, though.
Nobody can hold a candle to you.
If the student is not as good as the teacher,
translation.es: Si el alumno no es tan bueno como el maestro,

translation.en: then the teacher's not doing a good job.
translation.es: el maestro no hace bien su trabajo.

translation.en: [Father] Well, you have done a wonderful job teaching her, honey.
translation.es: Hiciste un gran trabajo enseñándole, cariño.

translation.en: She still got some work to do.
I think she ready for the big time.
Don't speak at my table unless I ask you a question.
translation.es: No hables en mi mesa si no te hago una pregunta.

translation.en: -I don't need permission to speak. -When you're in my house, you do.
translation.es: - No necesito permiso para hablar. - En mi casa sí.

translation.en: -Then I'll leave. -Yeah! Get the fuck out!
translation.es: - Entonces me iré. - ¡Sí! ¡Lárgate! Déjala. No quiero una adoradora del diablo.

translation.en: Beauty, let her go. Don't need this devil worshipper in my home.
translation.es: ¡Lárgate! Déjala. No quiero una adoradora del diablo.

translation.en: -I don't worship no devil. -You don't worship God.
translation.es: - No adoro al diablo. - No adoras a Dios.

translation.en: Can we all just calm down?
[Father] We are having a family discussion,
translation.es: Es una discusión familiar y, por lo que sé,

translation.en: and last time I checked, you aren't part of this family.
translation.es: Es una discusión familiar y, por lo que sé, no eres de esta familia.

translation.en: -Maybe one day I will be. -[Father] What you gonna do?
translation.es: - Un día lo seré. - ¿Qué vas a hacer?

translation.en: I wouldn't touch that thing with a ten-foot pole.
translation.es: No tocaría esa cosa ni con un palo.

translation.en: Let's run away and get married and never come back.
You think marriage is a joke? Huh?
translation.es: ¿Creen que el matrimonio es una broma?

translation.en: "For this reason, a man leaves his mother and father
translation.es: "Por esta razón, el hombre deja a su madre y a su padre

translation.en: and unites with his wife to become one."
translation.es: y se une a su esposa para volverse uno,
no dos, sino una sola piel.
Por tanto, lo que Dios ha unido

translation.en: That you're one flesh with your wife?
That you only have eyes for her?
Cain, would you take my plate, please, son?
translation.es: Caín, ¿me llevas el plato, por favor, hijo?

translation.en: [woman] Oh, well, your husband asked me to come by around six.
translation.es: Su esposo me pidió que viniera cerca de las seis.

translation.en: -Why you leave her on the doorstep? -I don't want her up in my damn house.
translation.es: - ¿La dejaste afuera? - No la quiero en mi casa.

translation.en: [Mother] I don't need to hear her out to know she full of shit.
translation.es: No necesito escucharla para saber que miente.

translation.en: Then I'mma talk to her myself.
You can't make a decision like that without me! I'mma ask the woman in if that's all right with you.
translation.es: - ¡No puedes tomar esa decisión sin mí! - La haré pasar si te parece bien.

translation.en: and… beauty of Lena, soul of Billie, the--
translation.es: la belleza de Lena, el alma de Billie, la…

translation.en: Yes, she does. You taught her well.
The torch has to be passed to someone, and I believe that someone is your daughter.
translation.es: Le deben pasar la antorcha a alguien más y creo que esa persona es tu hija.

translation.en: That's the same thing she said to me ten years ago.
translation.es: Es lo mismo que me dijo hace diez años.

translation.en: And I was telling the truth.
It's just that I think you were ahead of your time.
translation.es: pero creo que te adelantaste a tu época.

translation.en: No. Beauty is right on schedule.
translation.es: No. Beauty está en la época adecuada.

translation.en: A blind man could tell you she's going places.
translation.es: Un ciego podría decirte que logrará mucho.

translation.en: It takes somebody who knows what to do…
translation.es: Se necesita a alguien que sepa qué hacer…

translation.en: I can shape that to make something out of that…
translation.es: Puedo darle forma y hacer algo con eso…

translation.en: I can bring people to the table…
…so that everyone in America is gonna want a piece of her.
translation.es: para que todos en Estados Unidos quieran una parte de ella.

translation.en: And she can make you a whole lot of money, can't she?
translation.es: Y puede hacerte ganar mucho dinero, ¿no?

translation.en: [woman] We can agree to work together on this.
translation.es: Podemos acordar trabajar juntas en esto…

translation.en: I can promise you you're never gonna have to work again for the rest of your life.
translation.es: Te prometo que no tendrás que volver a trabajar en toda tu vida…

translation.en: [Mother] And if everybody gets a piece,
translation.es: Y si todos reciben una parte,
- Se trata de Beauty. - Lo sé.

translation.en: And I want what's best for her. You want what's best for your bank account.
translation.es: - Quiero lo mejor para ella. - Lo mejor para tu cuenta bancaria.

translation.en: Don't make me smack you in front of this white woman.
translation.es: No me hagas golpearte frente a esta mujer blanca.

translation.en: to make you know that I have Beauty's best interests at heart?
translation.es: ¿Qué puedo hacer para que sepas que quiero lo mejor para Beauty?

translation.en: A few more years. I'm ready now.
translation.es: - Unos años más. - Estoy lista ahora.

translation.en: You don't know what's out there.
translation.es: No sabes qué hay ahí afuera.

translation.en: The… the record industry is the devil,
translation.es: La industria discográfica es el diablo

translation.en: and he's just waiting to swallow you up.
[Mother] Do you know what they do to stars, huh?
translation.es: ¿Sabes lo que les hacen a las estrellas?

translation.en: They build you up just so they can tear you down.
translation.es: Te suben en un pedestal para luego derribarte.

translation.en: Can't nobody tear me down, Mommy.
You taught me to keep my head high
translation.es: Me enseñaste a tener la cabeza en alto
y a poner a Dios primero.

translation.en: Go to your room or be dragged.
translation.es: Ve a tu cuarto o te arrastraré.

translation.en: I am not sending her out in the world to be eaten by wolves.
translation.es: No la enviaré al mundo para que se la coman los lobos.

translation.en: [Father] How you know that she not a wolf?
translation.es: ¿Cómo sabes que ella misma no es un lobo?

translation.en: 'Cause she came out of my body.
Can you hand me that rag over there?
What you doing up so early? I couldn't sleep.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué te levantaste tan temprano? - No podía dormir.

translation.en: For sure, you got a lot on your mind.
Hey, get in the car. Try to turn it on.
[Father] You in the driver seat now.
Move over. I'll take it from here.
You really think I'm gon' make it?
I think that you're gonna give people hope.
translation.es: Creo que le darás esperanza a la gente.

translation.en: God, I can't help but look at you and still see my little girl. [inhales]
translation.es: No puedo evitar mirarte y seguir viendo a mi niña.

translation.en: I just wish I could hold on to you a little bit longer.
translation.es: Ojalá pudiera aferrarme a ti más tiempo.

translation.en: When you sign that contract, everything's gonna change.
translation.es: Cuando firmes ese contrato, todo cambiará.

translation.en: probably be the hardest thing I ever have to do.
translation.es: será lo más difícil que tenga que hacer.

translation.en: It's not easy for a father… [inhales]
translation.es: No es fácil para un padre

translation.en: …to send his little girl out into the world.
translation.es: enviar a su hijita al mundo.

translation.en: Jasmine and I were talking-- She's not your family.
translation.es: - Hablé con Jasmine… - No es familia.

translation.en: you're gonna regret it the rest of your life.
translation.es: lo lamentarás el resto de tu vida.

translation.en: Well, sometimes greatness skips a generation.
translation.es: A veces la grandeza se salta una generación.

translation.en: Why you let him do that? Do what?
translation.es: - ¿Por qué lo dejas hacer eso? - ¿Qué cosa?
Mi padre me dio la vida.

translation.en: You live your life, and I'll live mine.
translation.es: Vive tu vida, y yo viviré la mía.

translation.en: You really think you can trust him? Of course I can.
translation.es: - ¿Crees que puedes confiar en él? - Claro que puedo.

translation.en: [Jasmine] Just 'cause he's your father doesn't mean he's trustworthy.
translation.es: Que sea tu padre no significa que sea confiable.

translation.en: You gonna sign the contract or not?
translation.es: ¿Vas a firmar el contrato o no?

translation.en: Your life's gonna get real big real fast.
translation.es: Tu vida se volverá grande muy rápido.

translation.en: It's gonna be like a freight train you can't stop.
translation.es: Será como un tren de carga que no puedes parar.

translation.en: Yeah, but you'll be on that train with me.
translation.es: Sí, pero estarás en ese tren conmigo.

translation.en: What if I want my own train? My train will be a lot nicer.
translation.es: - ¿Y si quiero mi propio tren? - Mi tren será mucho mejor.

translation.en: -I don't got no money. -[bartender] It's on the house.
translation.es: No tengo dinero. La casa invita.

translation.en: How come you never give me no free shit? [bartender] She prettier than you.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué nunca me das nada gratis? - Es más bonita que tú.

translation.en: Is that your way of giving God praise?
You are not singing from your gut.
translation.es: No estás cantando desde el estómago.

translation.en: -I'm trying. -Y… y'all hear me do it every Sunday.
translation.es: Lo intento. Me oyes hacerlo todos los domingos.

translation.en: No, you won't, 'cause I done had enough.
And stop talking back. I'll try again.
translation.es: - Y deja de contestar. - Lo intentaré de nuevo.

translation.en: [Mother] You are way too pretty and way too talented
translation.es: Eres demasiado bonita y demasiado talentosa

translation.en: to walk out on a national stage and not be noticed.
translation.es: para salir a un escenario nacional y pasar desapercibida.

translation.en: [Beauty] I just wanna use the gift God gave me.
translation.es: Solo quiero usar el don que Dios me dio.

translation.en: [Beauty] People can fantasize about me all they want.
translation.es: La gente puede fantasear conmigo todo lo que quiera.

translation.en: [Mother] It's way too much to live up to.
I have sung behind people my whole life.
translation.es: He cantado detrás de otras personas toda mi vida.

translation.en: Never had the spotlight on my face.
translation.es: Nunca tuve el foco en la cara,

translation.en: But I've been close enough to see 'em get burned by it.
translation.es: pero estuve bastante cerca para verlos quemarse.

translation.en: It ain't all it's cracked up to be.
translation.es: No es todo lo que parece.

translation.en: It's not about you being careful.
translation.es: No se trata de que tengas cuidado.

translation.en: It's about you having to be something you not.
translation.es: Se trata de que tengas que ser algo que no eres.

translation.en: [scoffs] You can't spend the rest of your life trying to be something else.
translation.es: No puedes pasarte la vida tratando de ser otra cosa.

translation.en: You will end up forgetting who you really are.
translation.es: Terminarás olvidando quién eres en realidad.
Eso no me pasará a mí.

translation.en: You think I don't know who you are?

translation.es: Una madre conoce a su hija.

translation.en: Folk gon' wanna know who you laying with, Beauty.
translation.es: Van a querer saber con quién te acuestas, Beauty.

translation.en: -And that's none of their business. -And that ain't how none of this work.
translation.es: - Eso no es asunto de ellos. - Y esto no funciona así.

translation.en: Just 'cause it didn't work out for you doesn't mean it won't work out for me.
translation.es: Que no te resultara no significa que no me resultará.

translation.en: You are sheltered, and you're spoiled.
We have spent our whole lives trying to protect you.
translation.es: Nos hemos pasado toda la vida tratando de protegerte.

translation.en: When you walk out on that stage, we can't come with you.
translation.es: Cuando salgas al escenario, no podremos ir contigo.

translation.en: So who gonna do it, then?
The world ain't ready for that.
translation.es: El mundo no está listo para eso.

translation.en: -I don't sleep in a bed with my friends. -That's because God's your only friend.
translation.es: - No duermo en la cama con mis amigos. - Porque Dios es tu único amigo.

translation.en: Life, life is about balance, Beauty.
translation.es: La vida se trata de equilibrio, Beauty.

translation.en: For every good thing you get,
translation.es: Por cada cosa buena que consigas,

translation.en: something bad… something bad is gonna happen.
It's okay if I'm not with you on that train.
translation.es: Está bien si no voy en ese tren contigo.

translation.en: Can't always get everything you want.
translation.es: No siempre obtienes lo que quieres.

translation.en: 'Cause that's not how the world works.
translation.es: Porque así no funciona el mundo.

translation.en: You don't think I should sign that contract, do you?
translation.es: ¿No crees que debería firmar ese contrato?

translation.en: I don't think your father's the only one that should be looking at it.
translation.es: Tu padre no debería ser el único que lo vea.

translation.en: -Find a lawyer. -I don't know how to do that.
translation.es: - Busca un abogado. - No sé cómo hacerlo.

translation.en: I'll always be here to protect you.
I woke up this morning. I had no doubts.
How many of y'all had doubts?
Well, we gonna clear that up right now.
All right now. How you doing, sister?
[pastor] Give it up for this beautiful choir, y'all!
Stand up if you love Him. Stand up if you love Him!
translation.es: Pónganse de pie si lo aman. ¡Levántense si lo aman!

translation.en: [pastor] All right, y'all. I have no doubts.
[pastor] Hey, help me remember ya right here.
translation.es: Tenemos un miembro nuevo. Griten por Jesús. Levanten las manos por Jesús.

translation.en: Shout for Jesus. Raise your hands for Jesus.
translation.es: Griten por Jesús. Levanten las manos por Jesús.

translation.en: I see some smiles in here.
You got the pearls on today.
[Mother] We're all excited until the bottom drops out, right?
translation.es: Nos entusiasmamos hasta que las cosas salen mal.

translation.en: We all waiting here. She's gonna just take that pen
translation.es: Estamos esperando, y va a tomar ese bolígrafo y firmar en la página tres.
y va a tomar ese bolígrafo y firmar en la página tres.

translation.en: I want my lawyer to look at it. [woman] Oh, Beauty.
translation.es: - Quiero que mi abogado lo vea. - Ay, Beauty.

translation.en: Your dad and I have looked that contract over a million times.
translation.es: Tu papá y yo revisamos ese contrato más de un millón de veces.

translation.en: Now my lawyer could go over it again.
What you need with a lawyer?
Jasmine thought I should get one.
translation.es: Jasmine pensó que debía buscar uno.

translation.en: What you doing? Come over here. Get up. Come on, now. Right now!
translation.es: ¿Qué haces? Ven aquí. Levántate. Vamos. ¡Ahora mismo!

translation.en: What the hell you think you're doing?
I'm just looking out for myself.
That's what this is about for you.
translation.es: De eso se trata esto para ti.

translation.en: And I wanna make sure I have a say in it.
-You know she has a name. -I don't give a shit what her name is.
translation.es: - Sabes que tiene nombre. - Me importa una mierda su nombre.

translation.en: I am your father, and you're not gonna disrespect me.
translation.es: Soy tu padre y no me faltarás el respeto.

translation.en: I'm not trying to disrespect you.
I wanna make sure I'm doing the right thing.
If you don't sign that contract now,
translation.es: Si no firmas ese contrato ahora,

translation.en: I'mma put your shit on the front lawn, and you can fend for yourself.
translation.es: pondré tus cosas en el jardín delantero y podrás arreglártelas sola.

translation.en: After all I done for you, this is how you repay me?
translation.es: Después de todo lo que hice por ti, ¿así me pagas?

translation.en: I never thought I'd see the day
translation.es: Nunca pensé que vería el día

translation.en: when my own daughter thinks I'm trying to steal from her.
translation.es: en que mi propia hija creyera que intento robarle.

translation.en: Well, you better figure it out, honey.
You better make a decision fast
because we worked too hard to get here for you to throw it all away.
translation.es: porque trabajamos demasiado para que lo tires todo por la borda.

translation.en: Okay, gonna be a big star.
-[woman] We did it. -[Father] I think we did it together.
And I'm gonna be there for you every step of the way.
translation.es: Y te apoyaré en cada paso del camino.

translation.en: Are you really happy for me, Mommy?
translation.es: ¿De verdad estás feliz por mí, mami?

translation.en: Why your face lookin' so long?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tienes la cara tan larga?

translation.en: What you mean you can't find her?
I called her house three times, and no one answered.
translation.es: Llamé a su casa tres veces y nadie respondió.

translation.en: And then I went over there, and her mom said she wasn't home.
translation.es: Y luego fui, y su mamá dijo que no estaba en casa.

translation.en: Okay, well, I'm sure she's fine. She'll turn up.
Why don't you come downstairs with us and have a drink?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no bebes algo con nosotros abajo?

translation.en: Your brothers is already down there drunk.
what kind of man you are.
I could tell you what kind of man Abe won't be.
translation.es: Podría decirte qué clase de hombre será Abe.

translation.en: [Father] Yeah, he living the life right now.
'Cause he got my good looks and his mother's charm.
translation.es: porque es apuesto como yo y encantador como su madre.

translation.en: That's why he always walk around with that stupid look on his face.
translation.es: Por eso siempre camina con esa mirada estúpida.
Será mejor que valore este moment

translation.en: now 'cause as he gets older, his looks will fade,
translation.es: porque, a medida que envejezca, su apariencia se desvanecerá

translation.en: as will his ability to talk women out their panties. And he would be sad and miserable.
translation.es: con su habilidad para conquistar mujeres, y quedará triste y desdichado.

translation.en: and his children will only love him
translation.es: y sus hijos solo lo querrán

translation.en: will feel compelled to keep his memory alive.
translation.es: se sentirán obligados a mantener viva su memoria.

translation.en: Why not? 'Cause I wasn't there when you conceived.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué no? - No estaba cuando te concibieron.

translation.en: -But you was there when I was born. -Yeah. Not the same.
translation.es: - Pero estabas cuando nací. - Sí. No es lo mismo.

translation.en: I'm still trying to figure you out.
[Cain] Well, what you need to know?
if you'd do something for me.
I'd do anything for you, Pop.
translation.es: Haría lo que fuera por ti, papá.

translation.en: [Cain] What you need me to do?
The fuck you mean "make her go away"?
translation.es: ¿A qué mierda te refieres con eso?

translation.en: Show me what kind of man you are.
translation.es: Muéstrame qué clase de hombre eres.

translation.en: [Cain] Me and Abe just 'bout to go for a ride.
translation.es: Abe y yo vamos a dar un paseo.

translation.en: Get your ass in the fucking car.
-I'll tell you when we get there. -Fuck that. Tell me now.
translation.es: - Te diré cuando lleguemos. - No, dime ahora.

translation.en: -Just relax. -Nigga, don't tell me to relax.
translation.es: - Relájate. - No me digas que me relaje.

translation.en: I ain't got nothing against Jasmine.
If Beauty want a lady friend, that's her business.
translation.es: Si Beauty quiere una amiga, es asunto suyo.

translation.en: It ain't got nothing to do with us.
-It's got everything to do with us. -It's her life.
translation.es: - Tenemos todo que ver. - Es su vida.

translation.en: We can't have evil people hanging around our sister.
translation.es: No puede haber gente malvada con nuestra hermana.

translation.en: You need to man the fuck up!
-Get your ass out! -You really wanna fuckin' fight me?
Come out before I drag your ass out.
translation.es: Sal antes de que te arrastre.

translation.en: What? Try and hit me again!
Come here! You run like a girl, motherfucker!
I don't think I've seen you in here without her.
translation.es: Creo que no te he visto aquí sin ella.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I… I can be alone sometimes.
translation.es: Sí, bueno, a veces puedo estar sola.

translation.en: You know, I got some shit if you want it.
Yeah, that's not really my thing. It's Beauty's.
translation.es: Sí, eso no es lo mío. A Beauty le gusta.

translation.en: Well, maybe you could gift it to her.
[Jasmine] Come on, my dude. That ain't no gift.
translation.es: Vamos, eso no es un regalo.

translation.en: It would be if you gave it to her.
translation.es: Lo sería si se lo dieras.

translation.en: -[Jasmine] Meet you where? -Out back. Come on.
[bartender] Yeah… Right over here. I got you.
I told you I got you. Come on.
You ain't got nothing to say to me, boy?
You, who are just like me?
You couldn't do that shit, boy.
Just like everything else I ask you to do.
translation.es: Como todo lo demás que te pido.

translation.en: [Beauty] We just gotta get out of here.
You live your life, I'll live mine.
translation.es: Vive tu vida, y yo viviré la mía.

translation.en: Why didn't you say it back?
[Beauty] We finally have a place of our own.
to the criticism you've been getting from your Black audience?
translation.es: de las críticas que recibiste de tu público negro?

translation.en: Well, some people say that you're pandering to a white audience
translation.es: Bueno, algunas personas dicen que quieres complacer a un público blanco

translation.en: and that you don't want your music to sound too
translation.es: y no quieres que tu música suene

translation.en: -[woman whispers] Stay in character. -No, I'm asking you a question.
translation.es: - Mantén el personaje. - No, pregunté algo.

translation.en: No, we… we are gonna first appeal to the urban audience.
translation.es: No, primero atraeremos al público urbano.

translation.en: [woman] Well, we're gonna choose a song
that Black women are going to love.
translation.es: que les encante a las mujeres negras

translation.en: Also, that white teenage girls are gonna go crazy over
translation.es: y que también haga que las adolescentes blancas se vuelvan locas y la reproduzcan una y otra vez.

translation.en: and play over and over and over again.
translation.es: se vuelvan locas y la reproduzcan una y otra vez.

translation.en: That way, you'll get both sides of the market.
translation.es: De esa forma, capturarás ambos lados del mercado.

translation.en: Now, I'd like you to answer the question that I ask you,
translation.es: Ahora, me gustaría que respondieras la pregunta que te hice

translation.en: and I'd like you to do it in proper English.
translation.es: y que lo hagas en un inglés correcto.

translation.en: I… I don't know how to sing in Black, white…
translation.es: No sé cantar en negro, blanco…

translation.en: I just know how to sing, because that's what I like to do.
translation.es: Solo sé cantar porque eso es lo que me gusta hacer.

translation.en: You have a lot of love songs on your album.
translation.es: Tienes muchas canciones de amor en tu álbum.

translation.en: who are you singing them to?
Let's just go with the answer we prepared. Why do I have to do this?
translation.es: - Usemos la respuesta que preparamos. - ¿Por qué debo hacer esto?

translation.en: Because you cannot just be a singing star.
translation.es: Porque no puedes solo ser una estrella cantante.

translation.en: You, Beauty, have to be the whole package.
translation.es: Tú, Beauty, tienes que ser el paquete completo.

translation.en: There are a lot of little… little girls
who need someone to look up to.
If you wanna be a star…
you're gonna have to wear a mask.
Let's answer the question as it was prepared.
translation.es: Respondamos la pregunta como estaba preparada.

translation.en: I haven't found that special someone yet.
translation.es: No he encontrado a esa persona especial.

translation.en: But when I'm singing those love songs,
translation.es: Pero, cuando canto esas canciones de amor,

translation.en: I'm thinking about what he could be.
translation.es: pienso en cómo será cuando lo encuentre.

translation.en: Um, please don't say that in public.
Just wait for when we're at the house, okay?
translation.es: Espera hasta que estemos en casa, ¿sí?

translation.en: This is all still a lot for us to get used to.
translation.es: Todo esto aún es mucho, y nos tenemos que acostumbrar.

translation.en: I don't care what you do at home.
translation.es: En casa hagan lo que quieran,

translation.en: Just when we're out and about, we have a certain image to maintain.
translation.es: pero cuando estemos fuera de casa, debemos mantener cierta imagen.

translation.en: I just want what's best for you.
translation.es: Solo quiero lo mejor para ti.

translation.en: I know what's best for me.
translation.es: Sé lo que es mejor para mí.

translation.en: Why don't you try on one of the long, black, flowing ones?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no te pruebas una de las largas y negras?

translation.en: Why can't I just rock my own hair?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no puedo elegir mi cabello?

translation.en: that little Black girls like long, flowing hair.
translation.es: a las niñas negras les gusta el cabello largo y suelto.

translation.en: Maybe that's because people like you always tell them that's the only way they can be beautiful.
translation.es: Tal vez sea porque la gente como tú les dice que solo así pueden ser hermosas.

translation.en: You sure you don't wanna try a long one?
No. Actually, I like the short, curly one.
translation.es: No. De hecho, me gusta la corta y rizada.

translation.en: [Jasmine] Yeah, I like that one too.
[woman] Max, slap that one on there, and let's take a look at it first.
translation.es: Max, ¿por qué no le pones esa y la vemos primero?

translation.en: Ooh, ah, ah, ah, let's go.
Turn and dip and move that hip. Okay!
One more time. Let's go. And…
I never met a Black person who couldn't dance before.
translation.es: Nunca conocí a una persona negra que no supiera bailar.
Todas las estrellas del pop bailan.

translation.en: She ain't every pop star. Just keep the steps simple.
translation.es: No es como todas. Mantén los pasos sencillos.

translation.en: She can join up for some of those, and then the complicated stuff,
translation.es: Se puede unir en algunos y, para lo más complicado, puede ponerse a cantar adelante.

translation.en: she can be out front doing one of her long runs.
translation.es: y, para lo más complicado, puede ponerse a cantar adelante.

translation.en: Trust me, she hates this shit.
She's like a racehorse. [Jasmine] She's not an animal.
translation.es: - Es como un caballo de carreras. - No es un animal.

translation.en: [man] I'm sorry. It's just an expression.
I don't give a fuck what it is. Don't be calling my girl no horse.
translation.es: No me importa. No digas que es un caballo.

translation.en: Do we have the words to give you? Can we do that on the stand?
translation.es: ¿Tenemos la letra? ¿Las podemos poner en el atril?

translation.en: [woman] So you're not looking at it, but is there a way…
translation.es: No la estás viendo, pero ¿se puede…?

translation.en: I need some amazing vocalists behind her.
Who do you have in mind?
[neighbor] Hey, um, can you turn it down, please?
translation.es: Hola, ¿puedes bajar el volumen, por favor?

translation.en: I've been living here two whole years. Been quiet as shit.
translation.es: Llevo dos años viviendo aquí, y siempre es muy silencioso.

translation.en: Teenagers move in, and I haven't had a peaceful night since.
translation.es: Llegan adolescentes, y ya no puedo dormir en paz.

translation.en: You motherfuckers always playing music loud, giggling and shit.
translation.es: Siempre ponen música a todo volumen, se ríen.

translation.en: Well, you sure do look like one.
That's because you haven't seen me with my clothes off.
translation.es: Eso es porque no me has visto sin ropa.

translation.en: Listen, just, uh… just try to keep it down, okay?
translation.es: Mira, intenta no hacer tanto ruido, ¿sí?

translation.en: You were talking to him a long time.
Relax, he just wanted me to turn the music down.
translation.es: Tranquila, solo quería que bajara la música.

translation.en: I'm surprised you didn't cuss his ass out.
translation.es: Me sorprende que no lo insultaras.

translation.en: I wasn't in the mood to cuss his ass out.
translation.es: No estaba de humor para insultarlo.

translation.en: You always in the mood to cuss somebody out.
translation.es: Siempre estás de humor para eso.

translation.en: [woman] So you ready for your big debut?
[woman] Irv wants you to come on his show and sing.
translation.es: Irv quiere que cantes en su programa.

translation.en: So you're going on his show, and you're gonna sing.
translation.es: Así que cantarás en su programa.

translation.en: [Beauty] The album ain't even done yet.
[woman] Nobody wants you to go on The Irv Merlin Show and sing a song they've never heard of.
translation.es: Nadie irá al programa a verte cantar una canción que no conoce.

translation.en: [Beauty] I don't wanna go on TV singing someone else's song.
translation.es: No quiero ir a la televisión a cantar la canción de otro.

translation.en: I wanna sing my own music.
[woman] Nobody's gonna care what you're singing.
translation.es: A nadie le importará lo que cantes.

translation.en: What they care about is that you are a young, beautiful woman
translation.es: Lo que les importa es que eres una joven hermosa

translation.en: with a voice of an angel.
That song is wholesome, and Irv's audience knows that.
translation.es: Esa canción es honesta, y el público de Irv lo sabe.

translation.en: You mean white people know it.
translation.es: Quieres decir que los blancos lo saben.

translation.en: Well, why don't you take this?
See if you can learn something.
Take these and see what a couple of my big stars did
translation.es: Toma estas y mira lo que hicieron algunas de mis grandes estrellas

translation.en: I have a conference call in five.
Kelly, get me Stevie on the phone.
[Beauty] Are you gonna come in with me?
How come Mommy didn't call me?
He's at Saint Michael's on the fifth floor.
translation.es: Está en Saint Michael's, en el quinto piso.

translation.en: I'm sorry I didn't come earlier to visit you. I…
translation.es: lamento no haber venido antes a visitarte.

translation.en: I didn't know you were sick.
They said they have to open me up,
Not getting enough blood or something.

translation.es: Eso es por comer tanto cerdo.

translation.en: But I'm young. I can do all that.
translation.es: Pero soy joven. Puedo hacer todo eso.

translation.en: -If I don't make it outta here-- -Don't… don't say that.
translation.es: - Si no salgo de aquí… - No digas eso.

translation.en: Let me speak my piece, okay?
I've always been an ambitious man.
translation.es: Siempre he sido un hombre ambicioso.

translation.en: I got that from my father.
I think that's why I was so determined to make something of myself.
translation.es: Creo que por eso estaba tan decidido a convertirme en alguien.

translation.en: I wanted my life to have meaning.
translation.es: Quería que mi vida tuviera sentido.
me doy cuenta de que debo conformarme con solo ser el jefe de mi casa.

translation.en: for just being the head of my house.
translation.es: de que debo conformarme con solo ser el jefe de mi casa.

translation.en: I wasn't even good at that.
That's why it was so important
to me that you make it.
I thought, if you went far,
[Father] That's why it's hard for me to say this…
translation.es: Por eso me cuesta decir esto…

translation.en: but I need you to give me my cut.
translation.es: pero necesito que me des mi parte.

translation.en: [Father] I'm the one negotiated that contract for you. You know what? I'm not doing this.
translation.es: - Negocié ese contrato por ti. - No haré esto.

translation.en: [Father] I know you got a new apartment downtown.
translation.es: Sé que tienes un apartamento nuevo en el centro.

translation.en: I even heard you bought your little girlfriend a car.
translation.es: Hasta oí que le compraste un auto a tu noviecita.

translation.en: Yeah, and where'd you hear that?
You can't keep nothing from me.
Is that why you wanted to see me?
[Father] All I need is for you to pay me what you owe.
translation.es: Lo único que necesito es que me pagues lo que me debes.

translation.en: You owe me your whole life.
[chuckles] I didn't think the business was gonna change you,
translation.es: No pensé que ese mundo te cambiaría,

translation.en: but you up in here acting all crazy, and you ain't even had a hit record yet.
translation.es: pero actúas como una loca y no has ganado nada con tu álbum.

translation.en: I'mma have a whole bunch of 'em.
And while I'm celebrating, drinking champagne,
translation.es: Y mientras esté celebrando, bebiendo champaña,

translation.en: Those the last words you wanna say to your father?
translation.es: ¿Eso es lo último que le dirás a tu padre?

translation.en: Is that how you want me to remember you?
[Irv] How would you describe the young lady who's about to come out here?
translation.es: ¿Cómo describirías a la joven que está por salir?

translation.en: Well, I would say she's magical.
[woman] Thank you. And I think she's strong and confident.
translation.es: Gracias. Y creo que es fuerte y segura.

translation.en: It's true. She has a beautiful complexion.
translation.es: Es cierto. Tiene una tez hermosa.

translation.en: You ready? Of course I am.
Your father would be so proud.
Jas, can you put that thing away?
This is a big deal. I wanna capture the moment. It's gonna be on TV.
translation.es: - Quiero capturar este momento importante. - Saldrá en televisión.

translation.en: Wha-- You hear how slow they playing?
If they play like that, you'll put everybody to sleep.
translation.es: Si tocan así, harás que todos se duerman.

translation.en: I'mma go tell them to speed it up.
Ma, they the house band. I think they know what they doing.
translation.es: Mamá, son la banda de la casa. Creo que saben lo que hacen.

translation.en: They're used to playing for little white girls.
But if it wasn't for her, I wouldn't be here.
translation.es: Pero si no fuera por ella, no estaría aquí.

translation.en: [neighbor] Listen, I ain't got all day now.
translation.es: Oye, no tengo todo el día.

translation.en: Yo, who the fuck is that?
It's the boy from the other apartment, the one complaining about the music.
translation.es: Es el chico del otro apartamento, el que se quejó de la música.

translation.en: Not yet, but I will be.
Yeah? What makes you so sure?
that no one can sing better than me.
translation.es: que nadie canta mejor que yo.

translation.en: Can't nobody sing better than her.
Well, we just gonna have to see about that, ain't we?
Well, um, I just wanted to come back here, uh, wish you good luck, give you those.
translation.es: Bueno, solo quería venir a desearte buena suerte y darte eso.
- Relájate. - No. No me digas que me relaje.

translation.en: I just wanted him to come and hear me sing.
translation.es: Solo quería que viniera a oírme cantar.

translation.en: 'Cause I told him I was a good singer, and he didn't believe me.
translation.es: Porque le dije que era buena cantante y no me creyó.

translation.en: Is that the only reason you invited him?
the only person I wanna hear applauding is you.
translation.es: a la única persona que quiero oír aplaudir es a ti.

translation.en: I would applaud for you even if you fall flat on your face.
translation.es: Te aplaudiría aunque cayeras de bruces.

translation.en: …and she has this aura about her that's magnetic.
translation.es: …y tiene un aura que es magnética.

translation.en: [Irv] Yes. I was drawn to her right away when I saw her perform the other night.
translation.es: Sí. Me cautivó de inmediato cuando la vi cantar la otra noche.

translation.en: [woman] Mm-hmm. I don't think I've ever met someone quite like her.
translation.es: Nunca había conocido a nadie como ella.

translation.en: She's that kind of girl that only comes along once in a lifetime.
translation.es: Es esa clase de chica que solo aparece una vez en la vida.

translation.en: it's like God was showing off a little bit when He made her.
translation.es: como si Dios estuviera presumiendo cuando la hizo.

translation.en: -[Irv] Sure. -That He breathed it on her vocal cords…
translation.es: - Claro. - Que lo sopló en sus cuerdas vocales…

translation.en: smiled when He made her spirit
and laughed when He finished that face.
translation.es: y se rio cuando terminó esa cara.

translation.en: [woman] Yeah. I think, uh, she made… He made something truly special.
translation.es: Sí. Creo que hizo algo realmente especial.

translation.en: Yeah, I… I just think that she's gonna change all of our lives.
translation.es: Sí, creo que nos cambiará la vida.
